alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued December 23 at 10:21PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT WEST CENTRAL ESSEX...NORTHEASTERN WORCESTER AND NORTH CENTRAL MIDDLESEX COUNTIES... At 1020 PM EST, a band of heavy snow was located over Shirley, or 7 miles east of Leominster, moving east at 25 mph. Locations impacted include... Lowell, Methuen, Leominster, Fitchburg, Chelmsford, Andover, Dracut, Tewksbury, Westford, Pepperell, Tyngsborough, Groton, Lunenburg, Townsend, Littleton, Lancaster, Sterling, Ayer, Westminster and Shirley. The snow can accumulate at a rate of one inch per hour or more in this band of moderate to heavy snow. Be prepared for hazardous driving conditions. Consider delaying travel if you will be going through this band of heavy snow. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time when traveling.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Northern Worcester; Northwest Middlesex County; Western Essex
